title: TE Connectivity earnings, Revenue beat in Q4
text:
© Reuters. TE Connectivity earnings, Revenue beat in Q4

Investing.com - TE Connectivity (NYSE: ) reported fourth quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $1.33 on revenue of $3.3B. Analysts polled by Investing.com expected EPS of $1.31 on revenue of $3.27B. That compared to EPS of $1.35 on revenue of $3.51B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $1.5 on revenue of $3.39B in the previous quarter.

For the year, TE Connectivity shares are up 24.86%, outperforming the which is up 22.61% year to date.

TE Connectivity follows other major Technology sector earnings this month

On Wednesday, October 23, 2019, Microsoft reported first quarter EPS of $1.38 on revenue of $33.06B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $1.25 on revenue of $32.15B.

Alphabet C earnings missed analyst's expectations on Monday, with third quarter EPS of $10.12 on revenue of $40.5B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $12.28 on revenue of $40.3B

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: TE Connectivity earnings, Revenue beat in Q4
